Key Match Events: Ecuador played most of the match with 10 men after their captain Enner Valencia was sent off in the 22nd minute for a high boot
Jeremy Sarmiento smashed home just before halftime to put Ecuador in front
Jhonder Cadiz pounced on Salomon Rondon's cushioned layoff in the 64th minute following a quickly taken throw in to level the scores
Eduard Bello sealed victory for Venezuela in the 74th minute, smashing home a rebound from close range after Rondon drew a sharp save from Ecuador keeper Alexander Dominguez
Miscellaneous Highlights: Venezuela came from behind and earned a 2-1 victory over Ecuador in the Copa Am√©rica
Venezuela got their Group B campaign off to a winning start
Others: The match was played at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, California, USA with an attendance of 29,864
